description: These are some extensions of the base ope.viewlet model, preconstructed    viewlets for container management, and new primitives like a private event    channel, and private annotation storage on the viewlet manager, multipagewiard    viewlets, and formlib viewlets.
longdescription: These are some extensions of the base ope.viewlet model, preconstructed    viewlets for container management, and new primitives like a private event    channel, and private annotation storage on the viewlet manager, multipagewiard    viewlets, and formlib viewlets.
